header.description: I build pixel-perfect, engaging, and accessible digital experiences using modern web technologies. Specializing in full-stack development in Toronto, Canada.

seo.title: Carlos Zabaleta - Professional Software Engineer in Toronto
seo.description: Experienced software engineer and full-stack developer based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Specializing in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and modern web development technologies. Available for software development projects and consulting.
